wobani.resources.texture.cubemaptexture

Class StaticCubeMapTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.resources.texture.AbstractTexture
      • wobani.resources.texture.StaticTexture
        • wobani.resources.texture.cubemaptexture.StaticCubeMapTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, ChangableColorSpace, CubeMapTexture, EasyFiltering, Texture

    public class StaticCubeMapTexture
extends StaticTexture
implements CubeMapTexture
    Stores data about a loaded texture. You can load a texture only once, if you try to load it twice, you get reference to the already loaded one.
    See Also:
    loadTexture(List paths, boolean sRgb)
